descriptionHtml:
My first mod, it's just a preset for my main character. RaceMenu is required :Â  http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?

Mods needed for the exact look:
SkySight Skins by fadingsignal : http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58443/?
Northborn Scars by Northborn : http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49279/?
Beards by Hverglmir : http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28363/?
Geralt Eyes by Didjos : http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11933/?

Preset from WICO by Provisioncore and Windsong was used : http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/84898/?

Place file in \Skyrim\Data\SKSE\Plugins\CharGen\Presets

I have a crappy laptop, the preset will most likely look a lot better when you use it.

Also, I don't plan on updating it, sorry if you have any problems.
author: gh0stblade
